headline: Review & Preview: Inflation Relief Rally
summary: All three indexes notched new records today, spurred higher by a much-awaited inflation report that came in cooler than expected.  The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 1%, closing north of 47,000 for the first time ever.  Caterpillar, IBM, and Apple were the biggest contributors to the current 1,000-point increase, while Home Depot, Sherwin-Williams, and Travelers Cos. subtracted the most, according to Dow Jones Market Data.
